channel.title: Illustrations on Seraphine Arts
channel.description: Recent content in Illustrations on Seraphine Arts

item.title: Paradise
item.description: The third of four handmade originals from the collection “Fairy Garden”. Watercolour, fineliner & metal leaf embellishment on Hahnemühlepaper paper. 40cm x 40cm

item.title: Fairy Garden #2
item.description: The second of four handmade originals from the collection “Fairy Garden”. Multilayered “3D” arwork, painted with watercolour, fineliner & gold lacquer on Hahnemühle paper. 20cm x 20cm

item.title: Fairy Garden #1
item.description: The first of four handmade originals from the collection “Fairy Garden”. Multilayered “3D” arwork, painted with watercolour, fineliner & gold lacquer on Hahnemühle paper. 20cm x 20cm (Sold)

item.title: Reflection - Sun
item.description: The first illustration of the two-part set “Reflection”. Just as the light of the sun lets the moon shine, our world reflects the good we do. Inspired by the Vietnamese Lunar Year of the Cat, these motifs continue the “art for charity” project and cooperation with the LO-ANH Foundation (LOAN Stiftung) in 2023. All profits from this collection are donated to the LOAN Stiftung, supporting children in need and enabling access to education.

item.title: Reflection - Moon
item.description: The second illustration of the two-part set “Reflection”. Just as the light of the sun lets the moon shine, our world reflects the good we do. Inspired by the Vietnamese Lunar Year of the Cat, these motifs continue the “art for charity” project and cooperation with the LO-ANH Foundation (LOAN Stiftung) in 2023. All profits from this collection are donated to the LOAN Stiftung, supporting children in need and enabling access to education.

item.title: Christmas Robin
item.description: Cute Robin illustration for winter seasons bookmarks.

item.title: Autumn Butterfly
item.description: Autumn butterfly illustration for cozy bookmarks.

item.title: Autumn Fox
item.description: Cute fox illustration for cozy autumn bookmarks.

item.title: Infinity - Day
item.description: The second motif “Infinity” from the “Evolution” series represents the everlasting change as the one true constant in our lives and beyond. Illustrated using a mixture of digital art as Giclée print, watercolour painting and metal leaf embellishment. Each motif has a “day version” or “night version” counterpart.

item.title: Infinity - Night
item.description: The second motif “Infinity” from the “Evolution” series represents the everlasting change as the one true constant in our lives and beyond. Illustrated using a mixture of digital art as Giclée print, watercolour painting and metal leaf embellishment. Each motif has a “day version” or “night version” counterpart.

item.title: Metamorphosis - Day
item.description: The first motif “Metamorphosis” from the “Evolution” series, illustrated using a mixture of digital art as Giclée print, watercolour painting and metal leaf embellishment. Each motif has a “day version” or “night version” counterpart.

item.title: Metamorphosis - Night
item.description: The first motif “Metamorphosis” from the “Evolution” series, illustrated using a mixture of digital art as Giclée print, watercolour painting and metal leaf embellishment. Each motif has a “day version” or “night version” counterpart.

item.title: Dawn #1
item.description: Inspired by the Lunar New Year of the Tiger 2022, the DAWN illustrations were created as an art for charity project in close cooperation with the LO-ANH Foundation (LOAN Stiftung). 100% of the profit from all reproductions of this arwork, is donated to the foundation to support disadvantaged children from ethnic minorities in the most remote areas of Vietnam. You can find out more about the project here.

item.description: Inspired by the Lunar New Year of the Tiger 2022, the DAWN illustrations were created as an art for charity project in close cooperation with the LO-ANH Foundation (LOAN Stiftung). 100% of the profit from all reproductions of this arwork, is donated to the foundation to support disadvantaged children from ethnic minorities in the most remote areas of Vietnam. You can find out more about the project here.

You can find out more about the project here.

item.title: Grow at your own pace
item.description: “Grow at your own pace. Speed doesn’t matter as long as you’re making progress!” This chrysanthemum illustration was inspired by the quote above that I heard from a good friend during a time when creating art besides working my regular job was really challenging. Because this little piece of wisdom helped me to keep going, I felt inspired to create a collection around uplifting quotes and thoughts, hoping to share their happiness and positivity.
